Frequently Asked Questions

How do I register on Broker Adda?

You can sign up using your phone number or work email. Once verified, you can set up your profile, add preferences, and start exploring properties or managing leads.

What is Leads Management?

Leads Management helps brokers capture, track, and update client inquiries. You can add new leads, update their status, share them with teammates, and set reminders for follow-upsâ€”all in one place.

Can I transfer a lead to another broker or team member?

Yes. With one click, you can transfer leads to teammates or share them for collaboration. This ensures the right person handles the lead quickly.

How do customers benefit from Broker Adda?

Customers get access to exclusive property listings, personalized recommendations, and direct communication with verified brokers. They can also save searches, shortlist properties, and receive instant alerts.

Is my data safe on Broker Adda?

Absolutely. All user information, including customer data and broker details, is protected with industry-standard security practices.

Do I need to complete my profile?

Yes. A complete profile helps us give you personalized property suggestions based on your region, budget, and preferences. It also builds trust with other users on the platform.

Can I access Broker Adda on mobile?

Yes. Broker Adda is accessible on both web and mobile, so you can manage leads or browse properties anytime, anywhere.

Still Need Help?

Tell us your budget, preferred locality, and timeline. Our experts will shortlist properties and guide you end-to-end.
